sentence.Network_en: If she ever fancies a job swap, I could be interested.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果她想和别人互换工作，我会很感兴趣的。

sentence.Network_en: Next week they will swap places and will repeat the switch weekly.
sentence.Network_cn: 下周他们将交换座位，并且以后每周换一次。

sentence.Network_en: I'd gladly swap places with mummy any day.
sentence.Network_cn: 什么时候让我和妈妈交换角色我都愿意。

交换空间（Swap Space） - 被交换数据在磁盘上暂时存放的地方。Linux 用专用磁盘分区而不是特定交换文件来作为交换空间。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (originally in the sense 'throw forcibly'): probably imitative of a resounding blow. Current senses have arisen from an early use meaning 'strike hands as a token of agreement'

entry.def: If you swap something with someone, you give it to them and receive a different thing in exchange.

example.ex: Next week they will swap places and will repeat the switch weekly...
example.tran: 下周他们将交换座位，并且以后每周换一次。

example.ex: I'd gladly swap places with mummy any day...
example.tran: 什么时候让我和妈妈交换角色我都愿意。

entry.tran: 用…替换;把…换成;停下(手头的事)改做
entry.def: If you swap one thing for another, you remove the first thing and replace it with the second, or you stop doing the first thing and start doing the second.

example.ex: Despite the heat, he'd swapped his overalls for a suit and tie...
example.tran: 尽管很热，他还是脱掉工作服换上了西装和领带。

example.ex: He has swapped his hectic rock star's lifestyle for that of a country gentleman...
example.tran: 他一改摇滚歌星紧张忙碌的生活方式，开始过起了乡村绅士的生活。

entry.tran: 交流，交换(意见);互相讲述(故事)
entry.def: If you swap stories or opinions with someone, you tell each other stories or give each other your opinions.

example.ex: They all sat together at table, laughing and swapping stories.
example.tran: 他们都坐在桌子旁，有说有笑地讲述各自的故事。

sentences.sentence: "we had no money so we had to live by barter"

means.word_mean: 1. exchange or give (something) in exchange for
2. move (a piece of a program) into memory, in computer science

sentences.en: This comic was a swap that I got from Nick.
sentences.cn: 这本漫画书是我从尼克那里换来的。

sentences.en: I liked her coat and she liked mine, so we swapped.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢她的外套, 她喜欢我的外套, 于是我们就交换了。

sentences.en: I will swap you my bicycle for your radio.
sentences.cn: 我想拿我的自行车换你的收音机。

sentences.en: They swapped books with each other.
